resources.string:
Greetings users, 

 Welcome to my application. 

My name is Eslam Ehab Elsayed.
I am 24 years old.

I am a German University in Cairo ( GUC ) graduate.

I hold a bachelor's degree in computer engineering. 

Throughout my educational journey I have developed several android, windows, and web applications. 


Okay so let me repeat myself one more time.. 


 My name is Eslam Ehab Elsayed.
I am 24 years old.

I am a German University in Cairo ( GUC ) graduate.

I hold a bachelor's degree in computer engineering. 

Throughout my educational journey I have developed several android, windows, and web applications.
